CustomField.description: US-0007807 US-0007895 - Contracts P2.0 Field Label Changes and Tool tips US-0008522 - [Contracts] Volume Discounts enhancements in P2.0 Contracts
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Please enter the average FVF discount for the year, based on sales volume (GMV). This discount will be applied to the default FVF calculation. If you check the box “Special Volume Discount applicable“ on your contract, then the discount will be applied to the special FVF calculation.
CustomField.label: Volume Discounts
